name: Polipong
description:
Polipong is a brand new, funky puzzle game that will test your skills with style! Embark on a journey of over 250 levels with mad surprises along the way.

Spin gumball machines to win tokens and powerups, collect rewards to unlock bonus content, and challenge your friends and family for the Polipong crown!

FEATURES
◉ Free & easy to play, yet hard to master
◉ 250+ tricky levels of mad fun!
◉ Hidden stories inside bonus levels
◉ Animated level map full with unexpected surprises to be revealed!
◉ Follow your friends progress directly from the game map!
